name: Frozen Banshee

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 35.

skills.name: Death
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has an 80% chance pf placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Poison Sensitivity] debuff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +53%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Damage +10%
Level 7: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Cruel Exultation
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 2% for each debuff on the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Frost Blight
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 10% chance of placing a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff for 2 turns. The chance increases by 10% for each debuff on the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Level 6: Cooldown -1

seo.description: Undead Hordes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Awakened by the call of the Corruption, these ghouls andcreatures of the night inhabit the forgotten tombs and darkplaces of the world, and serve as minions to the Dark One. Whilemost are the desecrated carcasses of fallen Telerians, othershave lurked in the darkness for centuries... awaiting their time.
